## Checklist

- [ ] My code follows the style guidelines (see CONTRIBUTING.md)
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code where needed
- [ ] I have updated documentation (README, CHANGELOG)
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix/feature works
- [ ] New and existing tests pass
- [ ] SKILL.md uses imperative form (verb-first)
- [ ] Directory name matches skill name field
- [ ] All file references are correct
- [ ] No hardcoded credentials or sensitive data

## For New Skills

If this PR adds a new skill:

- [ ] Used skill-creator to generate boilerplate
- [ ] SKILL.md has valid YAML frontmatter
- [ ] Included comprehensive documentation
- [ ] Added examples showing usage
- [ ] Scripts are executable (chmod +x)
- [ ] Updated main README.md skill catalog
- [ ] Updated CHANGELOG.md
- [ ] Added to .claude-plugin/plugin.json
